name: .DN File Extension
summary: Learn about .DN files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A DN file contains a 3D scene created by Adobe Dimension, a professional program used to create real-life mockups and abstract artwork. It stores information about objects and graphics placed on a canvas, along with settings applied to the scene, such as lighting intensity and camera perspective. DN files are commonly created and shared among graphics professionals designing life-like visualizations of products.

content: Graphic designers primarily utilize Dimension to design photorealistic mockups and product visualizations. When saving a 3D scene with Dimension, the application creates a DN file to store the contents. The DN files are working files, which means that they can be modified in Dimension, saved, closed, then reopened in Dimension for further editing.
NOTE: To create a DN file in Adobe Dimension, select File → New or New with Settings..., modify the 3D scene, then select File → Save... or Save As....

instructions: You can only open DN files with Adobe Dimension. To open the DN file with Dimension, select File → Open... or double-click the icon of the DN file if Dimension is already associated with the DN file.
To convert a DN file to another format in Adobe Dimension, select File → Export or select the Render view. Some formats you can export the DN file format to include .GLTF, .GLB, .OBJ, .PNG, and .PSD.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
